Texts.Chs: 绿手指的笔记: 太阳之子的尸体
当然，太阳之子的尸体不会随便安葬在坟墓里。他们一起被藏在一个少数人知道的地方。如果一切顺利，这些信息将在适当的时候被我掌握。我非常想学习神的生物学。
Texts.Eng: Of course, the corpses of the Sunborn do not rest in random tombs. They are hidden away, together, in a place known to a select few. If all goes well, that information should be in my possession in due course. I would very much like to study the biology of a god.

Texts.Chs: 翼族人布下了一场奇妙的骗局。他们谣言说他们的神的尸体-他们的神！- 在他们的坟墓中休息，这消息已经蔓延到整个宇宙。这样的谣言吸引了掠夺者，并且据说掠夺者为他们愚蠢的仪式提供了一个方便的、永无止境的活祭品来源。即使以我的标准来看，这也是天才之举。
Texts.Eng: The Avians have perpetrated a wonderful deception. The rumour that the corpses of their gods - their gods! - rest in their tombs has spread throughout the universe. Such rumours attract looters, and said looters make for a handy, never-ending source of live sacrifices, to use in their silly rituals. It is genius, even by my standards.
